description:
The following features will be unlocked after purchasing the "Fighting EX Layer Another Dash Full Package".

■Training Mode, Rank Match (Online VS), and Casual Match (Online VS) will be implemented.
■14 characters will be added.
■All character colors will be available to use.
■Spectator Mode (Online VS) will be implemented with the update scheduled for June.
name: FIGHTING EX LAYER ANOTHER DASH Full Package
